alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 10:25PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Linn County in north central Missouri... East central Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Jamesport, or 9 miles south of Trenton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Meadville, Wheeling, Utica, Chula, Lock Springs, Spring Hill and Avalon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
